algorithms
Class AbstractQLambdaSelector

java.lang.Object
  algorithms.AbstractMemorySelector
      algorithms.QLearningSelector
          algorithms.AbstractQLambdaSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISelector, IStrategy, IStrategyLearner, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PengSelector, WatkinsSelector
public abstract class AbstractQLambdaSelector
extends QLearningSelector

Common settings and behaviors of Q(lambda) algorithms

Sutton and Barto chap 7.6 page 182
Concrete implementations are following Watkin's or Peng's definitions.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
Serialized Form
